citations.narrative:
- In the Jacob's sheep pen, the upper shelter had multiple exposed sharp points within reach of the animals.
- In the drive through area, the resting platform for the tiger had an exposed sharp point within reach of the animal.
- In the back area of the drive through there is an old shelter barn in disrepair, with numerous exposed nails.
Sharp points are a potential injury risk, and must be removed from all enclosures.
Corrected at the time of inspection

The tiger is not currently being allowed access to the indoor shelter area and there is no other adequate shelter available.
The only source of shelter is a low hollow log type structure in the outdoor yard. This log is open on both ends and does
not provide appropriate shelter from wind, rain, and cold. The tiger can be locked out for public display for a reasonable
time, but must be allowed access to adequate shelter as needed for protection from the elements.
Correct from this time forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
- In the Jacob's sheep pen, the upper shelter had multiple exposed sharp points within reach of the animals. 
- In the drive through area, the resting platform for the tiger had an exposed sharp point within reach of the animal. 
- In the back area of the drive through there is an old shelter barn in disrepair, with numerous exposed nails. 
Sharp points are a potential injury risk, and must be removed from all enclosures. 
Corrected at the time of inspection 
3.127(b) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
The tiger is not currently being allowed access to the indoor shelter area and there is no other adequate shelter available. 
The only source of shelter is a low hollow log type structure in the outdoor yard. This log is open on both ends and does 
not provide appropriate shelter from wind, rain, and cold. The tiger can be locked out for public display for a reasonable 
time, but must be allowed access to adequate shelter as needed for protection from the elements.  
Correct from this time forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
